noun.description: An armoured, jawless fossil fish (ostracoderm) of the family Pteraspididae (formerly Pteraspidae), found in rocks of the Silurian and Devonian periods.

adjective.description: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the family Pteraspididae.

origin: Late 19th century. From pteraspid-, taken as stem of scientific Latin Pteraspis Pteraspis: see -id. Compare scientific Latin Pteraspidae, former family name.
